page.title: 111st Wick Scouts.
page.content: On a Friday night at Kirkhill Hall at 7.00pm we have our Scout meeting.First we have inspection and a flag break.A few games are played and we have badgework,where the leaders take us to different parts of the hall to teach us different things,such as mapping,knife and axe handling,first aid,etc. The scouts somtimes raise money by having jumble sales book_sales, discos,and sponsored bike runs for equipment,tents,and other things for the Scouts and for other funds.A whole load of hockey,basketball,baseball and football equipment has just arrived at the hall so the Scouts and Cubs can have a better time at playing games.The meeting finishes at 9.30pm and the flag is taken down.We clean the hall before we go home.
